1.title: Fire and Ice
1.plot: An argument over which is more "manly," hot or cold temperatures, leads Nate and Dolph to dare one another to sleep in extreme conditions to prove their temperature allegiances.

2.title: Fishing
2.plot: Dolph's attempt to fish off the balcony amuses Nate, until an unexpected tug on the line pulls the pair into a genuine struggle with a mysterious force below.

3.title: Dolph's Name
3.plot: Nate and Morgan confront Dolph about the mystery behind his choice of name.

4.title: Plastic Bags
4.plot: Dolph frets over Los Angeles' plastic bags ban after coming home with an arm-load of groceries.

5.title: The Kiss
5.plot: In order to make an embarrassing point, Dolph invites the neighbors over to make out in front of a horrified Nate and him.

6.title: Fire Alarm
6.plot: When an unexpected eruption of the fire alarm rains on Nate and Dolph's balcony time, the pair weigh their alternatives to evacuating the building.

7.title: Cop
7.plot: The sight of two women fighting with a cop on the street below intrigues Nate and Dolph. But when Dolph begins to involve himself in the action by shouting from the balcony, Nate struggles to keep him quiet.

8.title: Rating People
8.plot: Nate is outraged at Morgan for rating the attractiveness of pedestrians passing by on the street below. Acting fuel to the fire is Dolph's allegation of having dated exclusively perfect 10's.

9.title: Deeks
9.plot: Nate walks out on the balcony one afternoon and makes a startling discovery: a mysterious old man is sitting in his chair. He looks to Dolph and Morgan for an explanation, who seem inexplicably at ease with the pleasant intruder.

10.title: Ghost
10.plot: Nate tries to convince Dolph that their apartment is haunted after spotting a mysterious masked figure on the balcony.

imdb.plot outline: BALCONY is a series about the consummate new odd-couple, Nate and Dolph, brought together by the high cost of living in LA and a cursory friendship in college. A pair of working professionals aspiring to build an adult life for themselves, they are simply figuring out how to grow up. Basically five years behind their midwestern high school classmate counterparts on Facebook, Dolph and Nate are grappling with the hard questions life has to offer: which is more preferable, sleeping in hot or cold temperatures? Which pedestrian on the street is better looking than the other? Is it possible to actually fish off a balcony? Through their almost sibling-like rivalry and endearing camaraderie, they come together as a duo at the end of every work day, enjoying their fifth floor balcony status, as they both observe and judge the world below them in fun-loving, comical ways.
imdb.title: Balcony

Which pedestrian on the street is better looking than the other? Is it possible to actually fish off a balcony? Through their almost sibling-like rivalry and endearing camaraderie, they come together as a duo at the end of every work day, enjoying their fifth floor balcony status, as they both observe and judge the world below them in fun-loving, comical ways.::Alex George Pickering
